titles.title: Northern Nevada Economic Development and Conservation Act of 2020
Northern Nevada Economic Development and Conservation Act of 2020
Northern Nevada Economic Development and Conservation Act of 2020
National Forest Small Tracts Act Amendments Act
National Forest Small Tracts Act Amendments Act
Pershing County Economic Development and Conservation Act
Pershing County Economic Development and Conservation Act
Ruby Mountains Protection Act
Ruby Mountains Protection Act

To allow for transfer of ownership of certain Federal parcels in Nevada, to allow for disposal of Federal lands in Nevada for economic development, to make technical corrections to existing law, for conservation, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Natural Resources, and in addition to the Committees on Veterans' Affairs, and Agriculture, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
